items.sentence: Do you happen to know where Tom went to high school?
How do you drink your coffee, with or without sugar?
Tom did a lot of things that he shouldn't have done.
Not everything that Tom told me about Mary was true.
It would be a good idea to get rid of all this junk.
He bargained with the house agent for a lower price.
I hope that Tom isn't really planning on doing that.
Please tell Tom he should do that as soon as he can.
If you can't understand this, you must be a bit dim.
You can't accomplish anything without taking a risk.
